message: Hi - I'll be interviewing Alfred App (http://www.alfredapp.com/) and posting at http://inspiredbeta.com/ next week.  I just wondered if anyone has any questions they would like included in the interview such as startup problems, concept, roadmap etc.  Reply here or email me (hello inspiredbeta.com) - thanks.
Andrew has used social media really heavy during development (Twitter, Tumblr and others). I would like to know how that affected both his development and the roadmap of his app.
@emiltorp great question Emil.  Certainly social media gives live continuous feedback during ongoing development.
